pr_title: feat: Hide dashboard app name DHIS2-9604

timeline.message: feat: Hide dashboard app name DHIS2-9604

timeline.bodyText: Could DashboardWidgetAppSettings be a more natural name?

replies.bodyText: 100% right @larshelge, thanks. Renamed now. I was trying to follow the JSON path settings.dashboardWidget, and also put the class right after AppSettings in alphabetical order. But you are right that's the more natural name. Thanks. :)
replies.author: jimgrace
